flawed_nl_solution:
Ali made 5 circles with 8 boxes each so he used 5*8 = <<5*8=40>>40 boxes
There were 80 boxes to start with so now there are 80-40 = <<80-40=10>>10 boxes left
Ernie used 10 boxes to make one circle so with 10 boxes he can make 10/10 = <<10/10=1>>1 circles
#### 1

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 40, not 10. It appears there was a miscalculation with the digits before the final zero.
